snippet: Recently, scientists at two laboratories tweaked a dangerous bird-flu virus in order to make it more contagious. Was it ethical to even undertake such an experiment?
abstract: Recently, scientists at two laboratories tweaked a dangerous bird-flu virus in order to make it more contagious. Was it ethical to even undertake such an experiment?
lead_paragraph: Between 1 and 5 p.m. E.S.T. today, Jan. 9, join the discussion about the following question with the Ethicist, Ariel Kaminer.

headline.main: Armchair Ethicist: The Airborne Toxic Event
